joblist.title: Discover your dream job from top hiring opportunities on HireMe
admin.inform.title: Welcome information
home.banner01.content: HireMe - The place to connect talent with job opportunities. We bring you attractive positions from leading companies.
home.banner02.content: Discover your dream career with HireMe. We support you in finding a job that matches your skills and passion.
home.whyHireMe.customer: Customize recruitment processes based on employers' specific needs
home.whyHireMe.speed: Optimize the speed of candidate search and filtering
home.whyHireMe.experienceImplement: Experience in implementing large-scale recruitment projects
product.recruitingSection.subTitle: Solution for identifying and deeply analyzing job candidates, easily integrated with existing recruitment systems.
product.naturalLanguage.subTitle: Apply new technologies to optimize the ability to analyze, process, and understand natural language, meeting the diverse needs of different industries and fields.
product.dataAnalytics.subTitle: At TMA AI Center, our data analytics services provide the capability to efficiently process data and gather valuable insights.
product.speechProcessing.subTitle: AI in speech processing creates the foundation for more natural and enjoyable communication between humans and machines or between people, supporting a variety of languages and forms.
product.ocr.subTitle: Ability to convert many different types of documents with high accuracy and speed. Catering to the diverse needs of each customer, helping businesses save labor costs and improve working efficiency.
product.ocr.whyOCR: Why choose OCR at TMA AI Center?
product.ocr.why.diversity.title: Diversity with high accuracy
product.ocr.why.diversity.highlight.firs: Recognize many different types of text, from printed text to handwritten text on paper, whiteboard,...
product.ocr.why.diversity.highlight.seco: Supports many different languages such as Vietnamese, English, Japanese, Korean,...
product.ocr.why.diversity.highlight.thir: Continuously update new technology to optimize system accuracy.
product.ocr.why.integrate.title: Easy to integrate and deploy
product.ocr.why.integrate.highlight.firs: Can be integrated into data management systems, internal systems and other applications to improve workflow.
product.ocr.why.integrate.highlight.seco: Compatible with various hardware platforms, including On Cloud and On Premise.
product.ocr.why.performance.title: Increase performance, reduce costs
product.ocr.why.performance.highlight.fi: Reduce costs and save time compared to manual data entry and analysis.
product.ocr.why.performance.highlight.se: Applying technology to optimize resources and processing performance on each hardware.
product.ocr.roadmap.first.step.title: Input image
product.ocr.roadmap.second.step.title: Templates
product.ocr.roadmap.third.step.title: OCR
product.ocr.roadmap.fourth.step.title: Field extraction
product.ocr.roadmap.fifth.step.title: Post processing
product.ocr.roadmap.six.step.title: Result
product.ocr.medicalDevice.description: Extract information displayed on the screen of more than 30 types of medical devices automatically. Helps shorten time and minimize errors caused by traditional manual recording of information, especially for the elderly.
product.ocr.inBody.description: Helps shorten time and minimize errors caused by traditional manual recording of information. In addition, having accurate and automated data will provide valuable data for monitoring, analyzing and evaluating performance in sports, helping individuals or coaching teams make informed decisions. Useful and improves workout results.
product.ocr.prescription.description: Gather essential information from paper prescriptions swiftly and efficiently. The transition from the traditional manual data entry method to a cutting-edge automated process. With a simple scanning procedure, this feature effortlessly identifies and extracts vital details from prescriptions, automatically transferring them into the system. This is not just a convenient solution, ensuring accuracy, lightening workload, and saving time, but also holds great untapped potential waiting to be explored.
product.ocr.confirmDelete.content: Do you want to completely delete this dynamic template?
product.error.duplicatedNameDynamic: The information is duplicated. Please enter another model name
product.error.content.notLabel: Please add a label before creating a new template!

product.content.unsavedEditTitle: The information will not be saved if you exit the page. Do you want to continue editing dynamic templates?
product.error.content.notSelectTemplate: Please select the template to extract data before uploading images to the system!
product.ocr.typeTemplateCreate: Select the type of template you want to create
project.iph.summary: Application for statistical analysis based on people detection, tracking and counting people in an area, support multiple hardware platforms.
project.iph.highlight.second: High performance detection and tracking solution in overlapping scenarios.
project.jpTrainStation.summary: Application for statistical analysis based on people detection, tracking and counting people in an area, support multiple hardware platforms.
project.jpTrainStation.highlight.second: High performance detection and tracking solution in overlapping scenarios.
project.vtTruckMonitoring.summary: Application for statistical analysis based on truck object, vehicle number, full of stone, warning wrong direction of truck.
project.vtTruckMonitoring.highlight.thir: Parallel processing to increase AI task.
project.vtTruckMonitoring.highlight.fift: Implement custom tracking solution for faster tracking in simple condition.
project.parkingLot.summary: Application for slot management, warning in case slot is occupied by vehicle or goods.
project.parkingLot.highlight.first: Hybrid solution for AI and Image Processing for object detection and empty slot detection.
project.parkingLot.highlight.second: Apply image processing to handle the shading effect.
project.tLocker.summary: T-Locker is an intelligent locker solution designed to securely store and protect customers' personal belongings at retail locations such as supermarkets, stores, train stations, airports, office buildings, and residential areas.
project.tLocker.highlight.first: T-Locker enables users to utilize modern facial recognition methods for storage and retrieving items.
project.tLocker.highlight.second: The T-Locker wardrobe application is widely available in various locations, including apartment buildings, supermarkets, and shopping centers.
project.ocrMCare.summary: Extract information from health device screen and report paper.
project.ocrMCare.highlight.fifth: Screen rotation with angle up to 45 degree.
project.ocrMCare.highlight.six: Hardware: Tesla T4 (Cloud) NVIDIA v√† GeForce RTX 3060 (Local).
project.docsReader.summary: API for information parser of ID Card and Passport.
project.docsReader.highlight.second: Information Parsed Accuracy up to 95% with normal characters and 100% MRZ digits.
project.cdp.summary: The technology platform collects, manages and analyzes customer data from many different sources, helping businesses make the most of existing data to optimize business operations and enhance customer experience.
project.cdp.highlight.first: Provide a comprehensive 360¬∞ view of your customers by consolidating customer data from various sources.
project.cdp.highlight.second: Segment customers specifically and accurately with rule-based file segmentation, dynamic file segmentation, and predictive file segmentation.
project.cdp.highlight.third: Personalize and optimize the customer experience.
project.cdp.highlight.fourth: Automate the marketing process on many different channels, helping to optimize marketing activities and interact with customers at the right time, right channel, and right message.
